body:
Comment 4 by **sboyette**: 
It looks like whatever the problem(s) were, the 1.3 tree fixes things. On
OpenBSD 5.5:

----

$ hg update default
$ hg pull
$ hg update
$ ./all.bash
...
<snip>
...
real    0m10.462s
user    0m3.680s
sys     0m3.910s

ALL TESTS PASSED

---
Installed Go for openbsd/amd64 in /home/mdxi/BUILD/go
Installed commands in /home/mdxi/BUILD/go/bin
*** You need to add /home/mdxi/BUILD/go/bin to your PATH.
-bash-4.2$

----

Thank you for your help.
